column4: I'm guessing all these programs beginning with k aren't really needed
kthreadd ksoftirqd/0 khelper kblockd/0 kacpid kacpi_notify kseriod kswapd0 ksuspend_usbd kjournald kpsmoused kgameportd kondemand/0 klogd
its very likely those are Kernel processes...
i would say most all of them are.. they seem familer to me - google the specific names and see to be 100% sure.
i rember looking up some of them ages ago when i noticed them in the process tree.
ok also dr_willis when I run top it says 2 users, but I am the only user???
You could be logged in several different times/processes so its counting each one as a user
How can I check, looks funky to me
I just logged in like 10 minutes ago.. no one else is logged in
now go to a consle and log in again.. then check who again. :) and see if its now 3
